title: Detective Conan Movie 6 – The Phantom of Baker Street
alternative_title: Meitantei Conan: Baker Street no Bourei, 名探偵コナン　ベイカー街(ストリート)の亡霊
description: Conan is invited to a party with many other guests, to test a new virtual game system, when a murder mystery occurs. Now Conan must dive into the game system to figure out who the murderer is, with the help of the famous fictional character Sherlock Holmes. The lives of 49 kids testing the game are in his hands.
